// File Name :muldiv.cpp
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
typedef unsigned long long int ull;
typedef long long int ll;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	ull n,k,m;
	while(t--){
		ull div = 0;
		ull mul = 0;
		cin >> n >> k >> m;
		ull tl = n;
		if(k == 1){
			cout<<n<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		while(n%k == 0){
			div++;
			n = n/k;
		}
		mul = m-div;
		if(mul%2 == 0) {
			cout << n << endl;
		}else {
			cout << n*k << endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
